item.title: FUSE talk slides available
item.description: Tv is talking about the Bazil FUSE library at the local Gopher meetup tonight. Check out the slides.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hi. This blog post establishes the Bazil.org project. This is not an April Fool's joke. There are more ambituous things floating in the background, but many people have expressed interest in this, so here's an early release: a Go FUSE filesystem programming library. This is based on Russ Cox‘s fuse library, as hosted at https://code.google.com/p/rsc/source/browse/#hg%2Ffuse Here's how to get going: go get bazil.org/fuse The github repository is at https://github.com/bazil/fuse
